account_verification.title: Verificação de Conta
account_verification.text_one: _SPAN_ Conta Não Verificada _SPAN_, por favor verifique seu email clicando no link enviado para _BOLD_ _EMAIL_ _BOLD_.
account_verification.text_two: Não recebeu o email? Por favor espere até um minuto para receber o email e verifique o seu lixo eletrônico. Se ainda não tiver recebido nenhum email, você pode reenviá-lo ou mudar o email no campo abaixo.

banned_messages.text_one: Foi observado o uso de métodos para trapacear em sua conta. A utilização de plugins e scripts que alterem a interface do site ou quaisquer outros métodos para obter vantagem desonestamente é contra os Termos de Serviço do jogo.
banned_messages.text_two: A sua conta foi observada violando os Termos de Serviço por um moderador e, por consequência, você foi banido. Você deve ter recebido um email detalhando porque você foi banido.
banned_messages.text_three: Foi observado o uso de métodos para trapacear em sua conta. A utilização de plugins e scripts que alterem a interface do site ou quaisquer outros métodos para obter vantagem desonestamente é contra os Termos de Serviço do jogo.
banned_messages.text_temp: Como esta é sua primeira infração, sua conta foi apenas temporariamente banida. Caso continue trapaceando depois da remoção do mesmo, sua conta será banida permanentemente.
banned_messages.text_perm: Como esta foi a sua segunda infração, sua conta foi banida permanentemente.
banned_messages.text_end: Caso acredite que este banimento foi um erro, você pode criar um ticket no _LINK_ Discord _LINK_ do jogo, no canal #open-a-ticket.

carousel.social_promo: Ganhe Tickets Gratuitos Seguindo o AMQ no Discord e no Patreon!
carousel.patreon_promo: Ajude o Jogo e Ganhe Recompensas Exclusivas
carousel.sale_text: Receba o melhor custo-benefício de Tickets!
carousel.DELETED-skin_text: Ganhe skins exclusivas ao apoiar o AMQ!

quiz_of_the_day.title: Quiz do Dia
quiz_of_the_day.what_is: O que é o Quiz do Dia?
quiz_of_the_day.what_is_description: Quiz do dia é um evento diário sem limite de jogadores onde os mesmos podem testar suas habilidades contra o resto da comunidade. Atualmente é dividido entre quizzes classificatórios, um modo altamente competitivo, e quizzes temáticos, que apresentam diferentes quizzes da comunidade designados para dar uma única e divertida experiência.
quiz_of_the_day.championship_description: Os top 150 jogadores dos jogos classificatórios do mês disputam pela chance de se tornar o campeão do mês!
quiz_of_the_day.rest_day_description: Não haverá quizzes no dia seguinte ao campeonato.

novice.title: Iniciante
novice.description: 45 músicas voltadas para jogadores novos e em ascensão

expert.title: Veterano
expert.description: 85 músicas voltadas para os jogadores experientes. Oferece pontos classificatórios adicionais como recompensa.

weekly_quiz.title: Programação do Quiz Semanal
weekly_quiz.text: Veja a programação do quiz semanal e encontre mais informações sobre o modo

region_time.text: Região e tempo até o próximo quiz

ranked_rules.title: Regras dos Jogos Classificatórios
ranked_rules.text: Ao jogar partidas classificatórias, você concorda que não irá compartilhar dicas nem respostas com outros jogadores, nem utilizará qualquer ferramenta, método ou programa que lhe garanta uma vantagem injusta sobre os outros jogadores.

ranked_description.title: Jogo Classificatório
ranked_description.description: Desafie-se ao jogar contra amigos e a comunidade do AMQ ao participar de jogos classificatórios. Cada jogo lhe recompensará pontos classificatórios, desbloqueando novas recompensas exclusivas e te deixando mais próximo a se juntar aos melhores dos melhores no campeonato regional realizado ao fim de cada mês. _BREAK_ Importante pontuar que sua conta deve ser de nível 10 ou superior para participar de partidas classificatória.
ranked_description.region_description: Os jogos classificatórios são divididos em três distintas regiões (Oriental, Central e Ocidental), cada uma com sua própria classificação, horário de início e campeonato. Você pode participar em todas as regiões, mas os pontos classificatórios apenas contarão para a região em que forem ganhos.
ranked_description.ranked_game_description_one: 30 minutos antes do início, você poderá entrar na sala do jogo classificatório iniciante ou veterano pelo menu principal. _BREAK_ A sala inciante é voltada a jogadores novos e casuais, consistindo de 45 músicas, em sua maioria fáceis ou médias, com 20 segundos de tempo para responder. _BREAK_ A sala veterana é voltada para jogadores dedicados e competitivos, consistindo de 85 músicas completamente aleatórias com 15 segundos de tempo para responder.
ranked_description.ranked_game_description_two: No final de cada jogo classificatório, você ganhará pontos baseado na quantidade de músicas que você acertou. _BREAK_ Em jogos "Inciante", você ganhará 3 pontos por cada resposta correta. _BREAK_ Em jogos "Veterano", os pontos por música aumentam com o número de músicas que você acerta. As primeiras cinco músicas recompensam 4 pontos cada, as próximas cinco recompensam 5 pontos, 6 pontos nas próximas cinco e assim por diante.
ranked_description.end_of_season_description: No último sábado de cada mês, no lugar de um jogo classificatório, um campeonato é realizado no lugar. Os jogos do campeonato funcionam como um jogo classificatório, exceto que apenas os top 150 jogadores na região podem participar, com o vencedor ganhando o título de Campeão Regional. _BREAK_ Na Segunda-feira após o campeonato, todos os pontos classificatórios são zerados e uma nova temporada começa.
ranked_description.rules_description: O jogo classificatório é um teste de habilidades individuais, então é importante que você não compartilhe dicas ou respostas com outros jogadores. Todas as ferramentas, métodos ou programas que dão uma desvantagem injusta sob os outros jogadores são banidos também (assim como para todos os demais modos). _BREAK_ Quebrar qualquer uma das regras pode resultar no banimento da sua conta e a remoção de todas as recompensas que adquiriu durante os jogos classificatórios.

avatar_drive.description: Doe para o próximo avatar! Uma vez que o valor chegue na meta, o avatar em primeiro lugar será adicionado ao jogo! Note que a votação continuará por mais alguns dias após o objetivo ser alcançado.

faq_what_is.title: O que é o Avatar Drive?
faq_what_is.text: O Avatar Drive é sua maneira de apoiar o jogo, ao mesmo tempo que influencia quais serão os futuros avatares. O sistema é bem simples, ao doar você pode escolher para qual avatar da votação será a doação ou sugerir um novo avatar. O valor doado é então adicionado a pontuação daquele avatar, e uma vez que a meta monetária da votação for alcançada, o avatar com a maior pontuação será adicionado ao jogo futuramente.

faq_nomination_type.title: Que Tipos de Avatares Eu Posso Sugerir?
faq_nomination_type.text: Você pode sugerir qualquer tipo de avatar que puder imaginar, contanto que este não seja ofensivo, possa legalmente ser adicionado ao jogo e combine com a estética do mesmo. Todas as sugestões deverão ser em inglês e serão revisadas, podendo ser rejeitadas caso elas não sigam as regras mencionadas acima.

faq_existing_avatar.title: Posso Sugerir um Personagem Já Existente?
faq_existing_avatar.text: Você é mais que bem-vindo para sugerir um avatar já existente para o seu Avatar Drive. Se um avatar já existente bater a meta, uma nova skin será adicionada para aquele avatar. Você também é mais que bem-vindo para especificar o que você quer que a skin seja, digamos que você queira dar à Hibiki uma roupa de ninja, você pode nomear "Hibiki Ninja".

popover.no_free_donation: Doação gratuita já utilizada este mês

text.illegal: Você deve inserir um valor para doação
text.minimum: O valor mínimo para doação é de 1€ (euro)

use_free_donation.title: Usar Doação Gratuita
use_free_donation.text: Você pode usar apenas uma doação gratuita por mês

avatar_drive.title: Avatar Drive

social_rewards.title: Recompensas pelas Rede Sociais
social_rewards.description_2: Como um agradecimento por participar do servidor do Discord e seguir o Patreon do jogo, você pode resgatar uma recompensa de 8 tickets por cada rede social vinculada a sua conta. _BREAK_ Tenha certeza que entrou no servidor do _LINK_ Discord _LINK_ antes de resgatar sua recompensa. _BREAK_ Certifique-se de seguir (gratuitamente) ou apoiar o _LINK_ Patreon _LINK_ antes de resgatar a recompensa do mesmo.
social_rewards.DELETED-description: Como um agradecimento por participar do servidor do Discord e seguir o Patreon do jogo, você pode resgatar uma recompensa de 8 tickets por cada rede social vinculada a sua conta. _BREAK_ Tenha certeza que entrou no servidor do _LINK_ Discord _LINK_ antes de resgatar sua recompensa. _BREAK_ Certifique-se de seguir (gratuitamente) ou apoiar o _LINK_ Patreon _LINK_ antes de resgatar a recompensa do mesmo.

change_nickname_modal.description: Você pode trocar seu usuário (o nome que aparece no jogo) utilizando uma ficha de mudança de nome. Sua conta recebe uma ficha de mudança de nome por ano, além de uma ficha adicional mensal se você for um apoiador de nível 4 ou superior no Patreon. _BREAK_ Se você mudar seu usuário, seu antigo usuário ficará disponível para qualquer outro jogador usar (ainda que seja seu usuário original). _BREAK_ Seu usuário original ainda estará visível no seu perfil.

patreon_window.title: Patreon
patreon_window.description: Ajude a financiar o funcionamento e desenvolvimento do AMQ apoiando o jogo no Patreon. Trabalhar e compartilhar o AMQ com todos vocês foi e tem sido uma experiência incrível, e ainda há muito mais que eu desejo fazer no jogo. Ao apoiar o Patreon você estará não apenas me ajudando a cobrir os custos de manter o jogo, mas também de continuar o seu desenvolvimento! Como um agradecimento especial, você ganhará diversas recompensas exclusivas!
patreon_window.badge_level_info: Seu nível de insígnia é igual ao número de meses os quais você tenha sido um apoiador de nível 2 ou superior no Patreon

upload_emote.title: Carregar Emote
upload_emote.footer: Formatos de Arquivos Aceitos: .png (Padrão) e .gif (Padrão). Tamanho Máximo: 256kb

file_too_large.title: Arquivo Muito Grande
file_too_large.description: O tamanho máximo é de 256kb. O arquivo enviado tem _NUMBER_kb

no_standard_slot.title: Nenhum Espaço Disponível
no_standard_slot.description: Você não possui mais espaço para emotes normais

no_animated_slot.title: Nenhum Espaço Disponível
no_animated_slot.description: Você não possui mais espaço para emotes animados

errors.no_name: Você deve fornecer um nome ao emote
errors.name_format: Os nomes dos emotes só podem conter letras e números
errors.name_length: Os nomes dos emotes só podem ter até _NUMBER_ de caractéres

server_rejected.title: Erro ao Carregar o Emote
server_rejected.description: O servidor recusou o carregamento do emote.

emote_uploaded.title: Emote Enviado
emote_uploaded.description: Seu emote foi enviado com sucesso e está esperando aprovação

auto_submit.title: Envio Automático
auto_submit.description: Automaticamente envia sua resposta ao final do tempo de resposta

list_numbering.title: Número de Músicas
list_numbering.description: Mostra o número de músicas que tocaram da lista de cada jogador no placar

disable_emotes.title: Desativar Emotes
disable_emotes.description: Impede os emotes de serem visualizados no chat

answer_time.title: Tempo de Resposta
answer_time.description: Mostra o tempo de resposta de cada jogador nos seus avatares

anime_link.title: Link do Anime
anime_link.description: O site de anime que é vinculado nas informações da música

auto_skip_vote.title: Pular Voto Automaticamente
auto_skip_vote.description: Automaticamente vote para pular depois de responder e/ou depois de dois segundos no período da resposta

block_non_friend_actions.title: Impedir Interações de Desconhecidos
block_non_friend_actions.description: Impede a interação de jogadores que não estão na sua lista de amigos

anime_names.title: Nome dos Animes
anime_names.MISSING-description: Mostra no idioma escolhido o nome dos animes mostrados nos quizzes

team_answer.title: Respostas do Grupo no Chat
team_answer.description: Mostre as respostas do seu grupo no chat durante jogos entre times

sound_equalizing.title: Equalização de Som
sound_equalizing.description: Equaliza o nível do volume entre diferentes músicas

max_volume.title: Volume Máximo
max_volume.description: O volume máximo para a equalização de som, aumentá-lo irá aumentar o volume geral, mas  músicas mais quietas podem não ser totalmente equalizadas

auto_hide_video.title: Auto-Esconder Video
auto_hide_video.description: Automaticamente esconde o video para as categorias selecionadas, ele ainda pode ser revelado ao clicar no mesmo durante o período de resposta

unwatched.title: Não-Assistido
unwatched.description: Vídeos de animes que você não assistiu

high_risk.title: Alto Risco
high_risk.description: Vídeos que possivelmente contêm spoilers ou que são para maiores de dezoito anos. Baseado em estatísticas dos jogadores

anime_list.description: Conecte sua lista do AniList, MyAnimeList ou Kitsu, e o jogo usará sua lista de anime ao escolher jogar quizzes com a configuração ativa para animes “assistidos”. _BREAK_ Listas são atualizadas semanalmente ou ao clicar "Atualizar". Para remover uma lista, a atualize sem um nome de usuário.

share_entries.title: Compartilhar Lista
share_entries.MISSING-description: Mostra quando um anime é de sua lista

show_scores.title: Mostrar Notas
show_scores.MISSING-description: Mostra a nota de cada anime de sua lista

update_messages.mal_private: Esta lista do MyAnimeList é privada e apenas listas públicas podem ser sincronizadas com o jogo
update_messages.mal_error: Erro no MyAnimeList, favor tentar novamente mais tarde
update_messages.anilist_error: Falha ao Acessar a Lista do AniList

particle_effects.title: Efeitos de Partícula
particle_effects.description: Controla o numero de partículas utilizadas nos efeitos, por exemplo, na animação ao ganhar pontos de experiência.

disable_floating_text.title: Desativar Texto Flutuante
disable_floating_text.description: O texto não flutuará ao ganhar pontos de experiência e notas musicais

graphics.name_effects_friend_list: Efeitos de Nome na Lista de Amigos

change_password_window.title: Alterar Senha
change_password_window.no_current_password: Você deve fornecer sua senha atual
change_password_window.error_contacting_server: Erro ao contatar o servidor, favor tentar novamente mais tarde

guidelines_window.title: Diretrizes
guidelines_window.description: Anime Music Quiz is meant to be fair and enjoyable for everyone. To ensure this it’s important you follow the below guidelines, as well as any instructions from moderators. Failure to follow these guidelines will result in chat or game bans depending on the case.

dont_cheat.MISSING-text: Usar qualquer tipo de software externo ou ferramenta que garanta uma vantagem injusta é considerado cheating. Isso em geral inclui, mas não se limita a, ferramentas que revelam informação extra sobre a musica, video ou serie.

no_teaming.MISSING-text: Jogos Classificatórios tem o objetivos de testar habilidades individuais. Fazer times ou compartilhar respostas com outros jogadores é estritamente proibido. Foram dos classificatórios (E do Jam) você é mais que bem-vindo para compartilhar respostas com amigos se os donos da sala estiverem OK com isso, mas não o faça nos classificatórios.

no_automated_grind.MISSING-text: Não tem problema grindar notas ou tickets, desde que você se esforce. Mas usar qualquer ferramenta ou método para automatizar ou semi-automatizar o grind é estritamente contra as regras, e resultará em um banimento permanente. Isso inclui grinding AFK em salas de time.

dont_harass.MISSING-text: O jogo é para todos, então bullying não será tolerado. Tudo bem praticar trash-talking entre amigos, mas tenha certeza de que todos estão confortáveis com isso.

no_hate_speech.MISSING-title: Sem Discurso de Odio ou Racismo
no_hate_speech.MISSING-text: Isso é algo obvio, mas sejam bons uns com os outros e não fique soltando ofensas raciais.

rhythm.MISSING-description: Moeda obtida ao dar roll em cópias via o Sistema de Tickets. Pode ser usado para desbloquear recompensas de tickets.

target_messages.MISSING-require_base_skin: Requer a Skin Base para ser Selecionada
target_messages.MISSING-rare_common: Skins Raras/Comuns não podem ser Selecionadas

resonance_system.MISSING-no_target_description: Selecione uma skin/avatar por meio da loja.

how_it_works.MISSING-description: Seleciona um avatar/skin épico ou lendário na loja, e ganhe pontos para este toda a vez que você der rolls no Sistema de Tickets, pontos dobrados se você usar um token de avatar no alvo. _BREAK_ Ao ganhar pontos suficientes (200 para épicas, 500 para lendárias) o alvo é desbloqueado!_BREAK_ Você pode mudar seu alvo a qualquer momento, mas isso reduzirá seus pontos pela metade. _BREAK_ Você pode selecionar avatares de temporada/tempo-limitado, mas você pode acumular pontos para eles enquanto eles estiverem na rotação.

set_target_prompt.MISSING-title: Selecionar Skin como Alvo de Ressonância?
set_target_prompt.MISSING-description: Rolls de Tickets vão garantir pontos para desbloquear esse avatar/skin. Alvos podem ser trocados, ao custo de 50% dos pontos de ressonância acumulados.

seasonal_target_prompt.MISSING-description: Pontos de Ressonância só podem serem ganhos enquanto o alvo estiver em rotação. Selecionar mesmo assim?

swap_target_prompt.MISSING-description: Isso custará 50% dos seus pontos de ressonância atuais.

target_no_active_warning.MISSING-description: Pontos de Ressonância não podem ser acumulados para alvos desativados, então rolls não recompensarão pontos de recompensa.

resonance_limit_warning.MISSING-description: Acumule pontos dos seus rolls para garantir desbloqueios ao selecionar um avatar/skin épico ou lendario roll-avel. Pontos serão perdidos sem um alvo. Para mais detalhes, selecione a aba da seleção à esquerda.

resonance_different_target_warning.MISSING-description: O alvo dos Tokens é diferente do alvo da ressonância, o roll não recompensará pontos de ressonância extras.

favorites.MISSING-no_favorite_selected: Nenhum Favorito Selecionado _BREAK_ Escolha Algo Clicando no _BREAK_ _ICON_ em Avatares Desbloqueados

auto_switch.MISSING-description: Troque automaticamente entre seus avatares favoritos no final de cada partida

locked.MISSING-description: Mostra o conteúdo que você não desbloqueou

unlocked.MISSING-description: Mostra o conteúdo que você desbloqueou

available.MISSING-description: Mostra o conteúdo que está disponível para ser desbloqueado na loja

unavailable.MISSING-description: Mostra o conteúdo que não está atualmente disponível para ser desbloqueado na loja

limited.MISSING-description: Mostra o conteúdo que só está disponível por tempo limitado

unlimited.MISSING-description: Mostra conteúdo que está sempre disponível para desbloqueio

exclusive.MISSING-description: Mostra conteúdo desbloqueado através dos sistemas de ticket

avatar_bonus.MISSING-description: Unlock 10 different skins/versions for this avatar to earn its badge

skin_bonus.MISSING-description: Unlock 10 different versions of this skin to unlock its backgrounds for other avatars

patreon_promo.MISSING-line_two: the Most Tickets for Your Money!

gift_no_friends.MISSING-description: You're only able to gift tickets to friends in your friend list.

ticket_system.MISSING-token_description: Select an avatar for _BREAK_ 50% chance for it _BREAK_ on all rolls
ticket_system.MISSING-token_description_dropdown: Select an avatar above and all rolls will have a 50% chance of being of that avatar

animated_promo.MISSING-extended_description: Promo event that allows you to roll the animated _NAME_ alt. version in the ticket system without first unlocking the base _NAME2_ legendary skin.

info.MISSING-description: The Ticket System allows players to spend tickets to unlock exclusive skins, skin versions, emotes, avatar backgrounds and decorations.

how_to_earn.MISSING-text: Players receive one ticket each time they level up, with a bonus 5 tickets every 10th level. Tickets can also be bought directly or be earned by backing the games Patreon.

how_do_rolls_work.MISSING-text: You can spend tickets to roll for exclusive rewards in the ticket system. Each roll costs 2 tickets. Rewards are split into 4 rarities, with different chances of being rolled:
how_do_rolls_work.MISSING-common: (Common) 85% chance: Simple skin recolors and Emotes.
how_do_rolls_work.MISSING-rare: (Rare) 10% chance: Advanced skin versions and decorations.
how_do_rolls_work.MISSING-epic: (Epic) 4.5% chance: Major skin version, seasonal skins and unique backgrounds.
how_do_rolls_work.MISSING-legendary: (Legendary) 0.5% chance: Unique skins and animated versions.
how_do_rolls_work.MISSING-info_footer: Skin versions for a ticket reward skin can’t be rolled until the skin has been unlocked.

how_does_rhythm_work.MISSING-text: If you roll a reward you have already unlocked, you earn an amount of rhythm based on the reward's rarity. Rhythm can be spent to unlock any specific reward item once enough of it has been collected.

how_does_avatar_tokens_work.MISSING-text: When buying tickets or backing the Patron, you’ll receive avatar tokens. These tokens can be used to focus ticket rolls towards specific avatars or seasonal skins, by selecting a target before doing a roll. When an avatar/season is focused, each individual roll will have a 50% chance of being a non duplicate (if any available) of that avatar/season. _BREAK_ The rarity pull ratio remains the same when using avatar tokens.

avatar_tokens.MISSING-description: Tokens used to roll for specific avatars, gained by purchasing tickets or being a Patreon backer.

not_enough_tokens.MISSING-description: You're missing _NUMBER_ avatar token(s) to be able to perform the roll with an avatar target. Avatar tokens are obtained by buying tickets or supporting the Patreon

errors.MISSING-failed_to_create_payment: Failed to create payment, please try again.
errors.MISSING-insufficient_notes_message: You don't have enough notes to unlock this item.
errors.MISSING-insufficient_rhythm_message: You don't have enough rhythm to unlock this item.

avatar_window.MISSING-silver_hibike_description: Unique launch recolor unlocked by having joined the game during the launch week or by unlocking all non unique recolors for all avatars.

hibiki.MISSING-thief: Hibiki is a well known happy go lucky adventurer, with a knack for getting in where she isn’t supposed to be and out with more than she entered with. A skill she’s often found boasting about at local taverns.
hibiki.MISSING-monster_trainer: Never being one to settle down for long, it didn’t surprise anyone when Hibiki set out to explore the world once she met her partner Hineko. Together the two of them make a powerhouse of a team, and are quickly making a name for themselves.
hibiki.MISSING-fast_food_employee: Finding herself in a new city, Hibiki had to quickly find a new job. Luckily, she ended up landing a great job up a local fast food joint, where she now spends her days working with great colleagues, while preparing for the next leg of her journey.

honoka.MISSING-standard: Being weak of health, Honoka spent most of her life at her family's estate, only kept company by her books and personal maid Kyouko, until recently when she by chance ran into Ritsu and the two became friends.
honoka.MISSING-druid: Honoka hails from a nation of druids, but is now traveling the world in search of new knowledge, the final test given to novice scholars of her people. Her travels are currently shared with Kyouko, a local knight, assigned to be her guide in this kingdom.

kyouko.MISSING-standard: Kyouko has been working as Honoka’s personal maid for several years. Her energetic nature and natural clumsiness have resulted in several accidents that would have gotten her fired if not for her friendship with Honoka.
kyouko.MISSING-knight: As the newest member of the royal guard, Kyouko was tasked with assisting Honoka, a scholar from an allied tribe of druids, in her travels around the country. Her days are therefore spent on the road, serving as Honoka's guard and guide.
kyouko.MISSING-bodyguard: Kyouko was dismissed as Honoka’s maid, due to security changes. Still wanting to help Honoka, Kyouko studied to become a bodyguard, though her clumsiness often causes issues, Honoka let it slide as she likes spending time with Kyouko.

ritsu.MISSING-standard: An energetic high school student with a passion for music, and club president of her school's music club. Ritsu is often found attending live concerts around the city, and it was at one of these she met and befriended an out of place Honoka.
ritsu.MISSING-bard: Ritsu was never a fan of the quiet life at her family’s farm, so when she got the chance, she ran away with a group of travelling entertainers. She now travels from town to town, sharing her music and exploring the world.
ritsu.MISSING-park_ranger: As a young girl, Ritsu fell in love with the nature in national parks on an overseas vacation. So after finishing her education, she joined the park ranger program, and now spends her days protecting the wild nature in the parks.
ritsu.MISSING-kitsune: In a certain city, there’s an urban legend about a Kitsune who hangs out around the city, joining in on the fun events going on. Ritsu has heard the rumor, but is unaware of the Kitsune bound to her, who sneaks out in her body from time to time.
ritsu.MISSING-summer_games: In what quickly have become a yearly tradition, athletes from all the different worlds meet up every summer to compete in friendly competition. This year, Ritsu is one of the favorites for winning the 100-meter sprint.
ritsu.MISSING-queen: Ritsu didn’t expect to end up as the queen of the country, but after a sudden turn of events she ended up with the crown. Although it’s all very new to her, she puts on a confident look, dedicated to not repeat her predecessors mistakes.

hikari.MISSING-standard: As a young easy going person, Hikari enjoys his simple life as a high school math teacher. He’s also ended up as the club advisor for the music club led by Ritsu, since her leadership allows him to spend most of the time relaxing.
hikari.MISSING-scholar: As a leading scholar at the royal academy, most would suspect Hikari to spend his days buried in dusty old tomes, and not exploring ancient ruins in search for lost arcane knowledge from past civilizations.
hikari.MISSING-fireman: As a boy, Hikari was saved by a firefighter, which sparked his love for the job. He’s now a beloved firefighter in his local community, spending his days helping the locals and saving people when accidents occur.

komugi.MISSING-standard: A local fox spirit of a half forgotten shrine in the countryside, Komugi is known for pulling pranks on the locals. Her shrine rarely gets visitors due to a larger shrine nearby, so she enjoys the visits she gets from Noel.
komugi.MISSING-tribal_sorcerer: Coming from a tribe of kitsune, Komugi mastered the art of fire sorcery at an early age. But after growing bored of the peaceful village life, she set out looking for adventure and fun.
komugi.MISSING-pirate: Known as a friend in port and a menace to all who run across her at sea. Komugi is a highly sought-after pirate for hire by anyone who has enough gold and adventures grand enough to satisfy her.

noel.MISSING-standard: As a self proclaimed master detective, Noel finds mysteries and riddles to solve in everything, no case is too big for detective Noel! After finding an old forgotten shrine, she now also drags its spirit Komugi along on her "detective work".
noel.MISSING-brawler: Noel never liked the strict nature of the temple she grew up in, so when she got the chance, she ran away to explore the world. She has now teamed up with Komugi, and together they travel around, getting into all kinds of adventures.
noel.MISSING-catgirl: During a case, Noel ended up possessed by a bakeneko. It wasn’t powerful enough to control Noel, but it still influenced her demeanor and made her sprout cat ears and tail, much to the dismay of Komugi who had to cover it all up.

kuriko.MISSING-standard: Even among witches, Kuriko is seen as especially powerful, but her carefree attitude often keeps her from using her full powers. She can often be found having fun during the conflicts between technology and magic that occur in her world.
kuriko.MISSING-sorceress: Hailing from a nomadic tribe in the far southern countries, Kuriko has traveled all the way to the kingdom on a mission to spread the word of her people, but more often she ends up tricking people into joining her on crazy adventures.

miyu.MISSING-standard: As a bright and cheerful girl, Miyu lived an uneventful life until her last year of middle school when she found a star shaped gem which allowed her to materialise her dormant magical powers.
miyu.MISSING-valkyrie: Miyu showed immense potential with magic at an early age, and was recruited as an royal magical knight, where her powers quickly earned her the rank of high knight and the nickname Valkyrie.
miyu.MISSING-ice_princess: During one of her battles, Miyu ended up defending a tribe of ice sprites, who as Miyu was about to be defeated, bestowed their powers to her. Transforming her into a magical ice princess, giving her the power to defeat the enemy.
miyu.MISSING-idol: After a mysterious evil organization infiltrated the idol industry, Miyu had to go undercover as an idol, to figure out and put a stop to their evil schemes. So, assisted by her magic, Miyu took to the stage as a world known idol.
miyu.MISSING-summer_games: Being a timid girl, people didn’t have much trust in Miyu being able to become a professional gymnast. But her talent and hard work proved them all wrong, and she’s now ready to display her skills at the yearly summer games.

shiina.MISSING-standard: Spending her childhood watching idols on television, Shiina dreamed of becoming one herself. Her dream finally started to come true as she began in highschool and was able to land the job as a local idol for her city.

mizuki.MISSING-standard: Mizuki serves as the shrine maiden at her popular shrine, sharing her blessing with its many visitors. Blessings which often end up in her favor. She often gets visits from Komugi who’s annoyed that the shrine is leaving Komugi’s forgotten.
mizuki.MISSING-high_priest: Being the High Priest of her tribe, Mizuki was enjoying her life. That all changed when Komugi broke the rules and left the tribe, forcing Mizuki to set out to bring her back. She now travels around the world, trying to catch Komugi.

marine.MISSING-standard: Due to her hardworking, stubborn and proud nature, Marine broke several records when she reached the rank of captain at her early age. A rank she has proven worthy of, after winning several battles against the neighboring magical nations.
marine.MISSING-buccaneer: Most people look twice when meeting Marine for the first time, but few who comment on her size live to tell the tale. Any doubts in her skills also quickly disappear after seeing her jump between decks, grinning as she brandishes her lance.

akira.MISSING-standard: A lot of Akira’s fans wouldn't expect that the normally cool and composed idol grew up as the oldest of several siblings. Working several jobs to help support them, until he by coincidence was scouted by a major idol agency.
akira.MISSING-samurai: As the crown prince of an eastern country, Akira wanted to experience the world before having to take over as a ruler. But being the crown prince, he has to travel in secret, to avoid getting caught in local politics.

rinko.MISSING-standard: To most of her classmates, Rinko appears as a normal hard working high school student, they wouldn’t expect her to be a big fan of gothic lolita, who spends most weekends dressing up and attending events.

alisa.MISSING-standard: Most people know Alisa as a gentle and proud girl, but due to her immense talent with the sword and magic she’s often leading the charge against the technological nations. She is also one of the few people who can stand Kuriko’s antics.

chika.MISSING-standard: As a self proclaimed genius and master scientist, Chika lets nothing stand between her and her next experiment! This has earned her a bit of a reputation at her school, where she’s the president of the science club.

yumemi.MISSING-standard: Yumemi is usually found sleeping at any chance she gets. Most people are therefore surprised when they hear she’s the vice president of the science club, though she only joined to help her childhood friend Chika get enough members.

katsu.MISSING-standard: Being a prominent player of the Zetto card game, Katsu is trying to collect the ancient precursor cards, which are said to hold the power to change the world. This often leads to battle against a shadowy organization who’re also seeking them.

riku.MISSING-standard: Riku is known by most as Rika, a famous live streamer and vlogger who’s known for getting access to places he’s not supposed to be. Riku himself mainly just enjoys the thrill of exploring and sharing his antics.

yuki.MISSING-standard: As a young girl, Yuki fell in love with the cheerful Christmas atmosphere. So she’s often found at cosplay events giving out presents to kids and friends. It was at one of these events she met and befriended Rinko.

fuwagi.MISSING-standard: Most people know Fuwagi as a lucky rabbit, as luck seems to conspire with her to get her out of any situation she finds herself in. Though, she views herself as unlucky, as it’s bad luck that gets her into those situations.
fuwagi.MISSING-traveling_merchant: Known as the lucky bunny, Fuwagi travels from town to town selling her wares. She got the lucky nickname because misfortune never affects her goods, but she views herself as unlucky, as every permanent store she sets up is destroyed in some accident.

yuuna.MISSING-standard: Being the child of a famous chef, Yuuna fell in love with the art of cooking at a young age. She now travels the world, on a journey to hone her skills and prove she can live up to her mom’s legacy.
yuuna.MISSING-painter: Loving to explore and experience the world, Yuuna set out on a trip across the globe to discover its beauty. She travels leisurely from place to place, taking the time to capture the surrounding beauty on her canvas.

haruki.MISSING-standard: Being closely attuned to nature, Haruki is one of the most powerful one-tailed kitsune and can even rival some nine tails. He’s often tasked with breaking up the fights between Komugi and Mizuki, a task he loathes.

asuka.MISSING-standard: Asuka’s skills in the sky have earned her the title of flying ace, and is therefore often called into battle against the neighboring countries. Personally, Asuka couldn’t care less about the war, and is just happy to fly freely through the sky.

fira.MISSING-standard: Fira wields immense powers as the heir to the dark dragon clan. Though, as she can’t stand the politics, she ran away from her home and is currently staying at Fuwagi’s house. Much to the dismay of Fuwagi who doesn’t dare ask her to leave.

naomi.MISSING-standard: Due to her direct attitude and nature, Naomi quickly became the leader of the delinquent group at her school. Though she doesn’t seek out fights, she often ends up in them, as she isn’t one to hold back if others starts one.

kumiko.MISSING-standard: Kumiko has been haunting her local village and pulling pranks on its inhabitants since she died over a century ago. Even though she’s known as a prankster, she’s well liked by the villagers and part of the local legends.

sachiko.MISSING-standard: Due to Sachiko's leadership, her squad has become known as an elite squad, carrying out critical tasks in the war against the magical nation. She also got a rivalry going with Marine, trying to prove the army’s importance over the navy.

kasumi.MISSING-standard: Kasumi comes from a secluded clan that has hunted evil yokai since ancient time. She recently finished her training and became a kunochi of the clan, though her inexperience still shown when she’s out on missions.

shin.MISSING-standard: Shin is known locally as a street cat, as he enjoys spending his time exploring the urban environment of his home city and interacting with the different people in it. Though, his curiosity does land him in trouble from time to time.
shin.MISSING-maid: Some friends wanted to pull a prank on Shin, and tricked him into helping out at a local maid café. But much to their surprise and dismay, Shin ended up being an extremely skillful maid, quickly becoming the café’s most popular.

lilith.MISSING-standard: Lilith comes from a long line of ancient vampires, but currently enjoy a normal high school life. Though she doesn’t hide her vampire origins, people around her doesn’t believe it, and just thinks it’s a quick of her personality.
lilith.MISSING-school_girl: Living her highschool life to her fullest, Lilith looks almost like any other energetic highschool girl, beside the fact she’s a vampire. While she doesn’t hide this, everyone around her just thinks she’s joking around.

mao.MISSING-standard: Mao was born with the reincarnated demon kings spirit sealed inside her, granting her the ability to tab into his powers, power which might corrupt her and free the demon king. Or that’s what she’ll tell you when you ask what she’s doing.
mao.MISSING-student_president: After a random series of events, Mao ended up as the student council president of her school. Taking up the responsibility, she’s now ready to rule the school with an iron fist and show everyone how a true student president acts!
mao.MISSING-demon_lord: Suddenly finding themselves summoned to another world as a demon lord would shock a lot of people, but not Mao, who relished in finally having the power she always dreamed of. Though, she still has to learn how to use them.

kei.MISSING-standard: Being born without magical talent, Kei decided to dedicate herself to developing trinkets and gadgets, utilizing the magical artifacts found in her country. Due to the conflict with the nearby technological nations, this have earned her both friends and foes.

akane.MISSING-standard: As the leader of a clan of lamia, Akane decided to stay neutral in the ongoing conflicts between the magical and science nations. Though her and clan members does sometime lend their skills of seduction to the magical nations.

umi.MISSING-standard: Umi visited the marine city Venity at a young age, and was instantly charmed by its calm beauty. So when Umi grew up, she decided to move to Venity, where she now enjoys life as a gondolier in her favorite city.
umi.MISSING-drummer: Most people know Umi as an elegant gondolier, so they’re pretty surprised the first time they see her let loose as the drummer of The Wave, letting out all that energy she keeps under wrap during her gondolier work.

etsuko.MISSING-standard: Watching her mother, a professional athlete, Etsuko fell in love with track and field sports. Though her hard work and skills, she’s now looking towards qualifying to the national championship as her school's ace runner.

yasuko.MISSING-standard: Yasuko enjoys her life in Venity, working at one of the city major companies. While many of her colleagues rushes around, Yasuko take life slowly, making sure to often sample the cities hot spring, often inviting Umi along.

yin_yan.MISSING-standard: Twins are a rare occurrence in the Kitsune world, so Yin and Yan were seen as a divine blessing by their clan. They now work as messengers for the clan, traveling the country bringing messages between its members.
yin_yan.MISSING-mahou_shoujo: After getting caught up in one of Miyu’s battle, the twins Yin and Yan ended up catching a magical gem, allowing one of them to transform into a magical girl, while the other take the shape of a fox. Power they use to fight together with Miyu.

ayu.MISSING-standard: Ayu was never one for following the norm or caring much about other people's expectations. As a self-proclaimed life enjoyer, she enjoys her days relaxing with her friends and hanging out in the city after school.

miku.MISSING-standard: Known by her fellow soldiers as their cheerful goddess of victory, Miku boast her skill as head strategist of magic nation's flying forces, while not shying away from leading from the front lines. To the dismay of the technological nations.

eksu.MISSING-standard: Eksu was created in an experiment that was discarded as a failure, so when Eksu materialized she found herself alone in an urban city. She quickly learned to stay hidden, but enjoys lurking around the city, watching the lights and people.

victoria.MISSING-standard: Victoria went to a private school for rich ladies in England, while she enjoyed her time there, she always found it too restrictive. She now often joins her family on business trips, where she gets to experience others and share her own culture.

sera.MISSING-standard: Living in the celestial realm, many angels don’t spend much time thinking about the mortal world, but Sera have always had a fascination of humans, loving to observe them, and sometimes sneaking down to the mortal world.

ignis.MISSING-standard: Ignis the Flaming Justice is a well known hero who defends the masses when evil is afoot. Though many people have meet Ignis, no one have been able to figure out who’s behind the mask, and he has yet to share the secret with anyone.
ignis.MISSING-adventurer: Ignis is known as a mysterious adventurer that rushes to the aid of people in need, no matter if it’s a caravan getting ambushed by monsters or farmers being harassed by corrupt knights, as he travels through the kingdom.

rin.MISSING-standard: Having a hard time with bullies in school, Rin quickly accepted when a strange entity offered her magical powers. Drunk on her new powers, Rin started enacting revenge on her former bullies, often leading her to clash with Miyu.

emiri.MISSING-standard: Looking forward to enjoying her dream high school life, Emiri was shocked to find Chika and Yumemi in her class. Their crazy antics often end up dragging her into them, interrupting her idea of the perfect high school life.

ichika.MISSING-standard: Scouted while in high school, Ichika turned out to be a prodigy in the field of acting. Quickly growing to become one of Japans most famous actors. Ichika herself loves bringing characters to life, and working with people in the industry.

neoko.MISSING-standard: Neoko surprised everyone with her sudden appearance on the v-tuber scene, quickly gaining a large audience who enjoy her quirky and passionate live-streaming. She now streams regularly, enjoying hanging out with chat and sharing her passions.

elika.MISSING-standard: Elika enjoy a quiet life in the French countryside, where she loves to emerge herself in detective novels. She often shares the story she reads with her younger cousin and pen pal Noel, who currently live in the far away land of Japan.

mofuji.MISSING-standard: Mofuji runs a small café in the countryside, but the location is often caught up in the battles between the technological and magic nations. Mofuji doesn’t mind this, and often keeps the café open while bombs and spell rains down around it.

arai.MISSING-standard: Arai runs her own underground quiz tournaments, which have made her infamous in some circles and famous in others. Despite the questionability of her being both the host and a participant, her tournaments draw huge crowds.

yua.MISSING-standard: Since high school, Yua has lowed tailoring and dressmaking, with a huge passion for wedding gowns. She secretly loves dressing up in them, dreaming of getting wed one day, but would die of embarrassment if her friends found out.

kaori.MISSING-standard: Kaori just started highschool where she’s the quiet and nervous girl in her class, but get her talking about frogs and she forgets all that. She managed to make a couple of good friends, who have to live with Kaori trying to buy all frog merch she finds.

saki.MISSING-standard: Due to being born with albinism, Saki spent most of her life indoors reading books. This has given her a lot of knowledge for her young age, something she loves to show off and can be rather cocky about.

hanabi.MISSING-standard: Hanabi is the proud hair to the red dragon clan, and doesn’t accept any disrespect towards it. She can’t stand the rivaling dark dragon clan, except for Fira, who she think is insanely cute and will do anything to protect.

fukami.MISSING-standard: While her kind usually takes part in the conflicts between the magic and technology nations, Fukami doesn’t care much about them. But much to the dismay of Marine, she loves sneaking into the technology nations to steal their fun toys.

asahi.MISSING-standard: Asahi is the captain of her school's track team, and got a reputation as a tough person who always speak her mind. But she’s actually rather chill, and enjoys her high school days hanging out with her friends without too much drama.

kiku.MISSING-standard: Kiku's family disagreed with her pursuing an education in music, but Kiku still enrolled in the music program at a large university. A decision she hasn't regretted, as she spends her days studying and playing the music she loves.

DELETED-kiki.MISSING-standard: Kiki’s family disagreed with her pursuing an education in music, but Kiku still enrolled in the music program at a large university. A decision she hasn’t regretted, as she spends her days studying and playing the music she loves.

song_library.MISSING-expand_count_description: The number of songs you have uploaded

expand_level_requirement.MISSING-description: The Expand feature allows players to help add missing video/mp3 sources for songs, and isn't available for accounts below level 5

expand_confirmation.MISSING-description: Help expanding the library by adding missing mp3 or video links. Songs missing from the library can be requested on the AMQ Discord

song_library.MISSING-library_description: View all songs in the library
song_library.MISSING-new_songs_description: View the newest 200 songs added to the game
song_library.MISSING-recent_wrong_description: View the songs you have recently guessed wrong

upload_message_success.MISSING-description: Video/mp3 will be added to the game after approval by a moderator

upload_message_failure.MISSING-temp_ban: You are temporarily banned from the Expand function. _NUMBER_ days left of ban
upload_message_failure.MISSING-perma_ban: You are permanently banned from the Expand function

upload_message_alerts.MISSING-provide_missing_version: Provide a link for a missing version
upload_message_alerts.MISSING-litterbox: Catbox files must be uploaded to litter.catbox.moe
upload_message_alerts.MISSING-host_format: URL must point to a valid host and be in webm/mp3 format
upload_message_alerts.MISSING-mp3_before_video: Mp3 must be uploaded after a video version is approved

song_library.MISSING-strict_description: Do not include groups that artists belong to when searching for artists/composers/arrangers.

guess_percent.MISSING-description: The overall correct guess percentage for this song and your own correct guess percentage counting your last 8 answers. Only includes typed answers in quizzes with larger song pools.

song_entry.MISSING-play_count_description: The total number of times this song has played for you, and your correct guess percent for it.

what_version.MISSING-title: What version of a song should I use?
what_version.MISSING-text: You should always use the version that was used in the show. For openings and endings, that's usually the 1:30 minute cut version. In the case that different versions are used throughout the show, you should go with the one most commonly used, if they're used equally go with the first one.

still_image.MISSING-title: Can I use a still image instead of the video?
still_image.MISSING-text: No, all uploads require there to be a correct video.

what_to_include.MISSING-title: What should be included in the video?
what_to_include.MISSING-text: The opening/ending/scene the song plays in. _BREAK_ If a song plays with talking or other sounds during the scene, replace the audio with a clean version that matches with what was used in the anime.

file_format.MISSING-text: Video files should be in webm format, and audio files in mp3. Any other formats will be rejected by the Scan Bot.

quality_requirements.MISSING-text: The song must not be pitched, sped up, slowed down or remixed in any way from their original versions. Any silence at the start or end of the song should be cut out. Likewise, extended notes at the end of the song should be cut short. In addition, the bitrate of an upload should not exceed 6.2 kbps. _BREAK_ The video should also be of decent quality and not contain hardsubs, though exceptions can be made for older or rare shows where a better quality isn't available.

volume_requirements.MISSING-text: Uploads should have a mean volume between -20 and -17db. The max volume ideally should not exceed -.5dB, and if possible should be around -5dB.

what_are_keyframes.MISSING-text: Keyframes are special frames set when the video is encoded. They allow for skipping in the video without having to load the rest of the video up to the point skipped to. _BREAK_ For AMQ a minimum of 1 keyframe for each 10 seconds of video is required, anything less will get rejected by the bot. It's recommended to have 1 keyframe per 5 seconds.

what_happens_file_submit.MISSING-title: What happens once my file has been submitted?
what_happens_file_submit.MISSING-text: After your song has been submitted, it'll enter the queue to be scanned by the scan bot. The scan bots check if the encoding, resolution and keyframe count of the file are correct. If the scan bot does not automatically reject your upload, it'll pass it to the moderator team, who will validate that the song is correct, check the quality of the video, and confirm that your edit is smooth and matches what was used in the anime. _BREAK_ If your song is rejected, you will receive a server message about it.

missing_song.MISSING-title: A song is missing from the database, how do I get it added?
missing_song.MISSING-text: First make sure the song isn't already in the database: Make sure that it doesn't appear in the Library when not in expand mode. _BREAK_ If it isn't in the Library or in game, you can request to have it added on the game's Discord. Make sure to read the FAQ channel and the pins in the #database-fixes channel for details on rules and how to request additions.

upload_rejected.MISSING-title: My upload was rejected but I didn't get a message?
upload_rejected.MISSING-text: There's a bug in the update system that causes some rejection messages not to be sent out. If you have any questions about why your upload got rejected, you can ask the database moderators in the game's Discord.

what_to_do_approved.MISSING-title: I'm not sure what to do to get my upload approved?
what_to_do_approved.MISSING-text: If your upload got rejected, or you're not sure how to get an upload approved, it is recommended to ask on the game's Discord server, where people will be able to help you.

one_slot_entry.MISSING-description: Permanently unlock a single quiz slot

unlimited_slot_entry.MISSING-description: Unlock unlimited slots for a one time payment

community_quiz_window.MISSING-patreon_promo: Become a level 3+ Patreon Backer to _BREAK_ unlock unlimited slots and more perks

error_cloning.MISSING-description: An error occurred while trying to clone the quiz. Please try again later.

quiz_cloned.MISSING-description: The quiz has been successfully cloned.

quiz_reported.MISSING-description: The quiz has been reported to the moderators for review.

quiz_deleted.MISSING-description: The quiz has been successfully deleted.

no_slots_available.MISSING-description: All quiz slots are currently in use. Unlock more slots or delete an old quiz before creating a new one.

delete_quiz_confirmation.MISSING-description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this quiz?

publish_quiz_confirmation.MISSING-description: Public quizzes can be played by anyone, once a quiz is public you can no longer edit or delete it.

report_quiz.MISSING-input_text: Please provide a reason for reporting this quiz.

report_failed.MISSING-description: You must provide a reason for reporting the quiz.

error_sharing.MISSING-description: An error occurred while trying to share the quiz. Please try again later.

error_publishing.MISSING-description: An error occurred while trying to publish the quiz. Please try again later.

not_enough_songs.MISSING-description: The quiz must have at least 5 songs to be published.

publish_limit_reached.MISSING-description: You have reached the maximum number of 10 published quizzes within 24 hours, please try again later.

quiz_published.MISSING-description: The quiz has been successfully published.

unearned.MISSING-description: Public quizzes awards medals based on your best result, ranging from bronze to diamond medals. Multiple choice are capped at silver medals

bronze.MISSING-description: Got 40% correct (80% for multiple choice) on this quiz! Next up is silver at 60% (100% for multiple choice)

silver.MISSING-description: Got 60% correct (100% for multiple choice) on this quiz! Next up is gold at 80%

gold.MISSING-description: Got 80% correct on this quiz! Next up is diamond at 100%

game_settings.MISSING-invite_description: Create an invite link to this room
game_settings.MISSING-swap_button_description: Swap between community and standard quiz

standard.MISSING-description: Compete in guessing the most songs

hint.MISSING-description: Get hints for songs, but earn fewer points when hints are used

quick_draw.MISSING-description: Earn more points the quicker you guessed the song

lives.MISSING-description: Start with lives, losing one each time you miss a show

battle_royale.MISSING-description: Start in a looting phase, collecting the shows that will appear in the quiz

boss_fight.MISSING-description: Players take turns being the boss, playing with only their songs and power-ups the boss can use against the other players

player_score.MISSING-description: Limit songs to anime that players have scored on their list within the given range.

anime_score.MISSING-description: Limit songs to anime with a score on Anime News Network within the given range.

vintage.MISSING-description: Year and season the anime was released.

anime_type.MISSING-one_must_be_selected: At least one anime type must be selected

genre.MISSING-description: Genres are determined using AniList. If optional is used, at least one optional genre will be required by the anime.

tags.MISSING-description: Tags are determined using AniList. If optional is used, at least one optional tag will be required by the anime.

song_selection.MISSING-description: How songs are chosen for the quiz. Watched covers all anime watched by any player.

watched_distribution.MISSING-description: How watched songs are chosen between players, either at random, weighted where larger lists gets more songs or an equal amount from each list.

song_types.MISSING-one_type_must_be_selected: At least one song type must be selected

song_categories.MISSING-description: Filter what category of songs is selected for each song type. Hover over the categories below to get a description of them.

standard.MISSING-description: Songs not in any of the other categories

chanting.MISSING-description: Songs with chanting as the only main vocals

character.MISSING-description: Songs sung by characters without being part of a musical performance

song_categories.MISSING-one_opening_type_must_be_selecte: At least one opening category must be selected
song_categories.MISSING-one_ending_type_must_be_selected: At least one ending category must be selected
song_categories.MISSING-one_insert_type_must_be_selected: At least one insert category must be selected

count.MISSING-description: Players earn 1 point for each show they guess correctly

hint.MISSING-description: Players can get hints for songs, but earn fewer points when hints are used.

speed.MISSING-description: Players earn more points the quicker they guessed the song

lives.MISSING-description: Players start with a set amount of lives, and lose 1 each time they get a song wrong another player guessed

boss.MISSING-description: Players take turns being the boss, playing with only their songs and a set amount of lives. The boss earns points the more songs they guess before they’re outed by the other players.

show_selection.MISSING-description: How shows are selected for the quiz

auto.MISSING-description: Game randomly picks shows from within the settings

looting.MISSING-description: Play a looting phase before the quiz, where players move around collecting the shows used for the quiz

typing.MISSING-description: Players write their answers, with dropdown suggestions to select from

mix.MISSING-description: All players can choose between typing and multiple choice answering

multiple_choice.MISSING-description: Players get possible 4 answers to choose from

lives.MISSING-description: The amount of lives players start with.

boss_lives.MISSING-description: The amount of lives boss players start with.

boss_power_ups.MISSING-description: The amount of different power-ups the boss players can use.

boss_max_song_count.MISSING-description: The max number of songs a boss player can get. If they survive all songs, they earn bonus points based on the amount of lives they have left.

inventory_size.MISSING-description: Number of shows players can carry during the looting phase

looting_time.MISSING-description: Time players have to spend looting

loot_dropping.MISSING-description: Allow players to drop collected shows during the looting phase

guess_time.MISSING-description: Time players have, with the song playing, to submit their answer

extra_guess_time.MISSING-description: Additional time players have to submit their answer after the song has finished playing

sample_point.MISSING-description: The point songs are played from

playback_speed.MISSING-description: The speed songs are played at

song_difficulty.MISSING-one_difficulty_must_be_selected: At least one difficulty must be selected

song_popularity.MISSING-one_popularity_must_be_selected: At least one popularity must be selected

skip_guessing.MISSING-description: Allow voting skip during the guessing phase

skip_results.MISSING-description: Allow voting skip during the results phase

queueing.MISSING-description: Allow spectators to queue up for joining the game

duplicate_shows.MISSING-description: Allow shows to have multiple of their songs selected in the same game

rebroadcast_songs.MISSING-description: Allow songs from rebroadcasts to be selected

dub_songs.MISSING-description: Allow songs from dubbed versions to be selected (legacy setting with limited songs)

full_song_range.MISSING-description: Allow songs to play up to the very ending of the song, can cause silence while answers are revealed

alerts.MISSING-password_missing: Password is required for private rooms
alerts.MISSING-one_player_score_required: At least one player score must be toggled on
alerts.MISSING-one_anime_score_required: At least one anime score must be toggled on
alerts.MISSING-one_playback_speed_required: At least one playback speed must be selected

select_name_for_setting.MISSING-name_too_long: Name must be at most _NUMBER_ characters
select_name_for_setting.MISSING-max_saved_settings: Max number of _NUMBER_ saved settings reached

popovers.MISSING-copy_setting_code: Copy the setting code for this game

rule_button.MISSING-description: Rule blocks are used to containers for other blocks and allow you to set specific quiz settings for songs in it

algorithm_button.MISSING-description: Algorithm blocks are used to use the games song selection algorithm to select songs for this quiz

message_button.MISSING-description: Message blocks adds a message displayed to the players between songs in the quiz

title_button.MISSING-description: Title blocks sets a title displayed during the quiz

description.MISSING-placeholder: Enter a description for your quiz

popovers.MISSING-number_of_songs_selected: Number of songs selected by this block
popovers.MISSING-number_of_songs_matched: Number of songs matching the settings
popovers.MISSING-watched_matching: Number depends on playing users list

number_of_songs_selected.MISSING-description: Number of Songs Selected from this Anime Block

rule_block.MISSING-tutorial_text: Double Click or Drag Anime/Song/Algorithm to add to the Rule Block

popovers.MISSING-block_info_content: Song Count: _NUMBER_ _BREAK_ Unique Anime: _NUMBER2_ _BREAK_ Unique Songs: _NUMBER3_
popovers.MISSING-allow_duplicates: Allow duplicate shows to be selected from this block
popovers.MISSING-guess_time_description: The default guess time for songs in this block
popovers.MISSING-sample_point_description: The default sample point for songs in this block
popovers.MISSING-playback_speed_description: The default playback speed for songs in this block

delete_message.MISSING-description: Are you sure you want to delete this rule block?

cannot_delete_message.MISSING-description: At least one rule block must exist in the quiz

order_rule.MISSING-description: The order songs are selected from this block

song_count.MISSING-description: Number of songs to select from this block

no_songs_warning.MISSING-description: No songs found in this block

rule_labels.MISSING-override_guess_time: Override the default guess time for this block
rule_labels.MISSING-override_sample_point: Override the default sample point for this block
rule_labels.MISSING-override_playback_speed: Override the default playback speed for this block

max_rule_block_count.MISSING-description: You have reached the maximum number of _NUMBER_ rule blocks

max_rule_block_song_count.MISSING-title: Max Rule Block Song Count Reached
max_rule_block_song_count.MISSING-description: All _NUMBER_ songs are already assigned to rule blocks, reduced the song count set on rule blocks before creating a new one

max_algorithm_block_count.MISSING-description: You have reached the maximum number of _NUMBER_ algorithm blocks

max_message_block_count.MISSING-description: You have reached the maximum number of _NUMBER_ message blocks

max_title_block_count.MISSING-description: You have reached the maximum number of _NUMBER_ title blocks

leave_warning.MISSING-description: Are you sure you want to leave the quiz builder? Unsaved changes will be lost.

no_quiz_name.MISSING-description: You must provide a name for your quiz before saving

save_failed.MISSING-description: An error occurred while trying to save your quiz. Please try again later.

error_loading.MISSING-description: An error occurred while trying to load the quiz. Please try again later.

block_limit_reached.MISSING-description: You have reached the maximum number of _NUMBER_ blocks allowed in a quiz.

quiz_builder.MISSING-page_close_warning: Leaving the page will cause you to lose any unsaved progress.

game_chat.MISSING-ranked_chat_level_warning: Level _NUMBER_ required to use ranked chat
game_chat.MISSING-event_chat_level_warning: Level _NUMBER_ required to use chat in event room
game_chat.MISSING-all_players_disconnect_message: All players have disconnected, pausing while waiting for reconnects
game_chat.MISSING-chat_normal_mode_message: Moderator joined, chat in normal mode
game_chat.MISSING-chat_in_emote_only_mode_message: No moderator, chat in emote only mode
game_chat.MISSING-kicked_from_room_alert: You have been kicked from the room

kicked_from_jam_game_alert.MISSING-description: You have been kicked from the jam quiz by a moderator and cannot rejoin the room for an hour

jam_quiz_ban_alert.MISSING-description: Your jam quiz expires in _NUMBER_ minutes

emotes.MISSING-locked_in_emote_description: Locked in emote, will be displayed when guessing ends

kick_player.MISSING-description: Kicked players will be unable to rejoin the game

game_chat.MISSING-page_close_warning: Leaving the page will leave the game. Sure you want to continue?

error_joining_queue.MISSING-not_a_spectator: You must be a spectator to join the queue
error_joining_queue.MISSING-already_in_queue: You are already in the queue
error_joining_queue.MISSING-disabled: Queueing is disabled in this room

blocked_join_messages.MISSING-ranked_championship: Only top 150 players in the region can join

community_quiz.MISSING-click_to_select: Click here to Select a Quiz
community_quiz.MISSING-click_to_change: Selected Community Quiz _BREAK_ Click to Change

too_many_custom_settings.MISSING-description: Too many custom settings, try removing some tags and/or custom vintages

selection.MISSING-description: Select the answer mode you want to use. You can change it later at the top right of the lobby.

no_players_ready.MISSING-description: At least one player must be ready to start the game

no_community_quiz.MISSING-description: You must select a community quiz to start the game

all_players_not_ready_warning.MISSING-description: Not all players are ready. All players not ready will be changed to spectators

ranked_rules.MISSING-description: Ranked matches are a place where players can test their individual skills up against the rest of the community. _BREAK_ In a ranked match, you compete against all the other players in guessing the most songs, which ranges from the easiest to the hardest in the game. _BREAK_ At the end of the match, you’ll get points based on how well you did. Gather points throughout the season to unlock unique badges and earn a spot in the championship match at the end of the season! _BREAK_ To ensure the integrity of ranked matches, it’s important that you follow the rules below, as breaking these rules can lead to your account getting banned and/or excluded from playing ranked.
ranked_rules.MISSING-themed_description: Themed quizzes are a place where players can test their skills in specific themes selected for the day against the rest of the community! _BREAK_ Each themed quiz will feature a unique themed song pool, and is meant to be a fun and fresh way to challenge yourself against the community in a less competitive and more fun-focused environment. _BREAK_ While not as competitively focused as ranked matches, it’s important that you follow the rules, to not ruin the experience of other players. Breaking the rules can lead to your account getting banned and/or excluded from Quiz of the Day.

play_solo.MISSING-description: Ranked is a test of individual skills, so giving hints and/or answers to other players, as well as receiving them, goes against the rules.

themed_team_play.MISSING-description: It’s possible to play themed quizzes as a team, to do so, set up or join your team from the top right option in the lobby. While in a team, you are allowed to work together to guess the answers, and will share the same score. _BREAK_ It’s not allowed to share any answers or hints with people not on your team.

no_cheating.MISSING-description: Using any kind of tool that gives an unfair advantage over other players is strictly prohibited. This includes using external tools to get additional information about the song, googling lyrics, and in general any external tool or method that gives an unfair advantage over other players.

mod_instructions.MISSING-description: The game's moderators work hard to keep ranked fair for all players, so it’s important that you follow any instructions issued by them, so that they can ensure this. _BREAK_ You can recognize moderators by the mod badge next to their name.

english_chat.MISSING-description: It isn’t possible to moderate every language, so keep messages in the ranked chat to English and emotes.

return_to_lobby.MISSING-popover: Start a vote for returning to the lobby

quiz.MISSING-no_songs_matching_settings: No songs match the quiz settings, returning to lobby

pause_button_popovers.MISSING-pause: Pause the game at the end of this song. All players can end the pause.

hide_team_messages.MISSING-in_team: Can't hide teams while in a team

hints.MISSING-point_value: The point value of the current song

name.MISSING-description: Reveal the length of the answer, and 4 of its characters

info.MISSING-description: Reveal some of the song info for this song

multiple_choice.MISSING-description: Get multiple choice options for this song

full_inventory.MISSING-description: Drop shows from your inventory (top left) to continue looting

name_hint.MISSING-description: Reveal the length of the answers, and 4 of its characters

song_hint.MISSING-description: Reveal some of the song info for the current song

peek_answers.MISSING-description: Reveal the answers already submitted by other players

multiple_choice.MISSING-description: Get multiple choice answers for the current song

joining_game.MISSING-description: You will be added to the game during the next result phase

join_team.MISSING-description: Enter team code to join a team, leave blank to join solo
